data.prayer: the state of Al Daayen has (about) 357 people who know Jesus, 2,319 people who know about him culturally, and 40,524 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Daayen, Qatar
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Al Daayen, Qatar by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Al Daayen.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Al Daayen, Qatar.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Al Daayen that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Al Daayen, Qatar a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Al Daayen, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.
